  OOC: Dewboy, have you read the Reward for incompetence post?
  
  Tyrael thought back to the ceremony of the execution. The robot he 
had looked at right after was Bleeder, Shadow Star's superior officer. 
They had both talked, and Tyrael had explained his reason's for his 
choice. Bleeder had been in agreement. Now, Tyrael had to announce it 
to the principal interested...
  He went to the junior officer's quarters. He hoped the young officer 
was there. After searching for a few minutes, he found the bot's door, 
and pressed the button announcing him.
  Tyrael: I am Colonel Tyrael. I have come to meet with you, Shadow 
Star.
